text: my name is Patrick Bosworth I'm one of
the three co-founders and the CEO of
Duetto which is a hotel software company
we exclusively serve the global hotel
industry in more than 70 countries we
help the human beings that work at those
companies make smarter decisions
particularly around pricing marketing
distribution and sales I think that
you're gonna see larger and larger hotel
companies starting to step away from
these massive proprietary software
platforms that they've built for
themselves and so that's a very
difficult process you know where if
you've been developing software for 40
years and spent hundreds of millions of
dollars on it knowing how to slice that
up and start having other companies
provided is very difficult and so
initially it's the mid-sized companies
that are leading and we now have most of
the top managed independent and small
hotel brands in the world working with
us and now increasingly starting to talk
to the major chains you have to
integrate into a very fragmented base of
property management systems which are
primarily on-prem but if you go into it
with a good plan you can build a very
big business and we certainly believe
that we're building a multi-billion
dollar business in this space which i
think is it's sorely needed I don't
think anyone would disagree it's just a
matter of who does it when you know are
we the ones to do it
and as of right now I'm bullish that we
are
